DOC.brief_summary: Analyse the glucose profile, based on continuous glucose monitoring by CGMS, in type 2 diabetics inadequately controlled by metformin, before and after the addition of Glimepiride.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Glucose Monitoring System (CGMS) in Type 2 Diabetic Patients Inadequately Controlled by Metformine Monotherapy; Analyze of Glycemic Profile Before and After Association of Glimepiride
DOC.criteria: Men or women aged 35 to 70 years Having given their consent Type 2 diabetics (HBA1c greater than 6.5% Fasting glycaemia greater than 1.40 g/l) not controlled by Metformin for at least 6 weeks.
